books.name: Neon Shards
books.author: Jake Graves
books.desc: Axiom Prime is a city where the sky no longer exists and corporations control memory identity and law. Towers of metal and light rise above streets filled with neon smoke and forgotten people. Reality itself can be edited and erased.Rhea Calder is a former corporate netrunner who now survives by moving illegal data through the digital underworld. A routine job leads her to a memory shard taken from a dying executive. The data reveals a hidden protocol designed to erase entire populations from history.As corporate hunters close in Rhea is forced to confront fragments of her own erased past. Artificial intelligences awaken and the city begins to fracture. Survival means choosing between exposing the truth or disappearing forever.Neon Ashes is a fast paced cyberpunk story about identity control and what it means to exist in a world where memory is power.

books.name: Omega Protocol
books.author: Michael Kane
books.desc: Humanity launches its first true interstellar mission aboard the generation ship Helios Reach. Every calculation has been measured and every risk minimized. The mission is designed to be slow precise and permanent.Midway through the journey the ship detects a region of space that behaves unlike anything recorded before. Against protocol the crew begins a controlled observation. Physics begins to fail and time itself behaves unpredictably.As relativistic effects intensify scientific debate turns into moral crisis. Survival depends not on heroics but on understanding limits and consequences.Event Horizon Protocol is a grounded science fiction novel about curiosity responsibility and a universe that does not care if humanity understands it.

books.name: Starfire Dominion
books.author: Laura Drake
books.desc: The galaxy has never known lasting peace. The Starfire Accord collapses when an ancient warfleet emerges from beyond known space. The Dominion Ascendancy claims ownership of entire star systems and has the power to enforce it.Captain Althea Vos commands the battlecruiser Vigilant Dawn which becomes the first ship to survive a Dominion attack. She is drawn into a war that spans systems cultures and generations.As alliances fall and ancient technologies awaken the fate of civilization depends on whether unity is possible in a galaxy built on conquest.Starfire Dominion is an epic space opera filled with massive battles political intrigue and the struggle between power and survival.

books.name: Starfire Dominion

books.name: The Crown of Ash and Thorns
books.author: Laura Drake
books.desc: The kingdom of Eldervale was forged by fire and bound to an ancient flame spirit. The royal line ruled through divine authority at a terrible cost. Now the capital burns and rebellion spreads across the land.Queen Seralyne Thorne loses her crown and is forced into exile. Armed with a cursed blade and haunted by prophecy she must cross war torn realms and ancient ruins to reclaim her throne or destroy it forever.Allies are scarce and enemies hide behind loyalty. Magic once used to protect the realm now threatens to consume it.The Crown of Ash and Thorns is an epic fantasy about destiny sacrifice and the cost of ruling.

books.name: Whispers Beneath the Briarwood
books.author: Damian Wilder
books.desc: The Briarwood is a forest that listens remembers and whispers. No map marks its borders and no traveler leaves unchanged.Elowen Mareth enters the forest in search of a missing child. Instead she finds ancient magic bound by forgotten bargains. The forest reveals buried truths and offers gifts that demand painful payment.Time bends beneath the canopy and shadowed figures stalk the paths. To escape Elowen must face the guardian of the Briarwood and the lies she has used to survive.Whispers Beneath the Briarwood is a dark fantasy story about temptation memory and magic that cuts deep.

books.name: Whispers Beneath the Briarwood

books.name: The Clockmakers Pact
books.author: Evelyn Park
books.desc: In the city of Brasshaven time is currency. Clock towers rule daily life and automatons serve the elite. Magic flows through gears steam and steel.Edric Holloway is a master clockmaker whose inventions keep the city alive. When he creates a sentient automaton bound to a temporal engine he signs a pact with forces that govern time itself.History begins to fracture as days repeat and futures bleed into the present. Hunted by industrial powers and haunted by regret Edric must choose between restoring the timeline or reshaping the world.The Clockmakers Pact is a steampunk fantasy about progress regret and the danger of mastering time.
